value.title: Robotics start-up Ishitva raises over $1 mn in Pre-Series A led by Inflection Point Ventures
value.excerpt: Ahmedabad-based robotics start-up, Ishitva has raised a Pre-Series A round of over $1 million led by Inflection Point Ventures. Ishitva Robotic Systems (IRS) is an OEM operating in the space of dry waste sorting technology.
